Create an account

To start investing, you need to attach a copy of your ID (identity document) or passport to prove your identity as an investor

Start now

InvestFrom 100 $

After activating your flipHouse account, you can replenish your investment balance in any available way:

* Bank transaction
* By credit card

Start now

Invest in different types of opportunities

Find out about the different types of our opportunities that will allow you to diversify your investment portfolio as much as possible

Buy-to-Let Opportunities

Scheme investments Buy-to-let , aimed at regular rental income

Learn more 

Development Loan Opportunities

Investment in construction for the purpose of subsequent rental or sale

Learn more 

Buy-to-Sell Opportunities

In a buy-to-sell opportunity, you lend money to a developer, to buy a property and either reform it, rehabilitate it, or to build it. The developer uses the money you lend to buy the property and reform it or rehabilitate it, or build it, and then put the property for sale

Learn more 

Tradeyour investment shares with other users

Make your first investment by purchasing any number of investment shares from other users on the exchange

Start now

Manage your investments through your personal account

You just have to choose the options that you like. You don't need to worry about paperwork, tenant management, renovations, etc. All of this will be taken care of. Always remember that diversification significantly reduces the risk of your portfolio. FlipHouse allows you to invest in different countries, cities, areas, types of opportunities and activities. It's easy to get the most out of your money at flipHouse

Start now
